info.title: ProdPad
info.description: Public API for interacting with data in a ProdPad account

tags.name: Ideas
tags.description: Endpoints for Ideas and associated items like user stories and comments.

tags.name: Feedback
tags.description: Endpoints for Feedback, Contacts and Companies.

get.description:
Returns a list of feedback which can be a straight list or grouped by contact using the group_by parameter. 
The list can also be filtered by state query parameter for active, archived, unsorted or all. 
Default active feedback is returned.

parameters.name: group_by
parameters.description: Setting to customer will group the feedback by customer

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Set to value of active for active, archived for archived feedback, unsorted for unsorted feedback and all for all feedback. Default is active.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Set to page through the results. Default is 1.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: For setting the number of results per page. Default is 100.

parameters.name: company
parameters.description: Set to filter the feedback results based on whether the feedback was entered for a contact linked to the company.

parameters.name: company_country
parameters.description: Set to filter the feedback results based on the country set for the associated company.

parameters.name: company_size
parameters.description: Set to filter the feedback results based on the size of the company for the associated company.

parameters.name: company_value
parameters.description: Set to filter the feedback results based on the value of the company for the company assocaited to the feedback.

parameters.name: customer
parameters.description: Can be either numeric ID, UUID of a contac or contact email.

parameters.name: product
parameters.description: Filter results by the product associated to feedback. Can either be the product UUID or product ID.

parameters.name: persona
parameters.description: Filter results by the persona associated to feedback. Can either be the persona UUID or persona ID.

parameters.name: job_role
parameters.description: Filter results by the job role of the contact associated to the feedback. Use the JobRole UUID.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Filter feedback results by the tags associated to the feedback. Mulitple tags can be specified and acts as an OR. Use the tag ID or UUID.

parameters.name: has_ideas
parameters.description: Whether the feedback is associated to one or more ideas. Default is either.

400.description: The API call was not correct.

403.description: The API or account doesn't have permissions for that operation.

post.description: Create a new feedback in the account. The feedback has to have either a name or an email and the actual feedback. The email is used to add the feedback to an existing contact.

400.description: The API call was not correct.

403.description: The API or account doesn't have permissions for that operation.

get.description: Return an individual piece of feedback.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Feedback ID.

403.description: The API or account doesn't have permissions for that operation.

put.summary: Edit an existing piece of feedback.
put.description: Edit the details of an existing piece of feedback.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Feedback ID

400.description: The API call was not correct.

403.description: The API or account doesn't have permissions for that operation.

post.description: Upload an attachment (movie, file, image etc.) to a piece of feedback.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Feedback ID

400.description: The API call was not correct.

403.description: The API or account doesn't have permissions for that operation.

get.summary: Get all ideas associated with a feedback
get.description: Return all the ideas linked to this piece of feedback.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Feedback ID

400.description: The API call was not correct.

403.description: The API or account doesn't have permissions for that operation.

get.description: Get a list of all the contacts in the account. This can be used to sync contacts between ProdPad and CRMs.

parameters.name: company
parameters.description: UUID of a company to filter contacts by.

parameters.name: persona
parameters.description: ID of a persona to filter contacts by.

parameters.name: job_role
parameters.description: UUID of a job role to filter contacts by.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: ID, UUID or name of one or more tags to filter the contacts by.

parameters.name: feedbacks
parameters.description: Wheter to include the feedback for each contact in the results. Default is false.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of results to return.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of results per page.

403.description: The API or account doesn't have permissions for that operation.

post.description: Create a new contact in the account.

400.description: The API call was not correct.

403.description: The API or account doesn't have permissions for that operation.

get.description: Returns the details of a contact.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Contact ID to fetch.

parameters.name: feedbacks
parameters.description: Whether to include the feedback provided by the contact in the response or not.

400.description: The API call was not correct.

403.description: The API or account doesn't have permissions for that operation.

put.description: Edit the details of the contact such as name, company, about etc.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Contact ID to edit.

400.description: The API call was not correct.

403.description: The API or account doesn't have permissions for that operation.

get.description: Return a list of companies. Using parameters allows you to also select whether to return feedback associated to the company via the contacts connected to the company. This is only available to accounts with an Advanced+ subscription.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Set to filter the companies based on the country. Use ISO Alpha-2 country codes. Only one country can be filtered at a time.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Set to filter the companies based on their size.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Set to filter the companies based on their value.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: Set to filter the companies based on city.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Filter feedback results by the tags associated to the feedback. Mulitple tags can be specified and acts as an OR. Use the tag ID or UUID.

parameters.name: contacts
parameters.description: Whether to include contacts associated with each company in the results. Default is true.

parameters.name: feedbacks
parameters.description: Whether to include the feedback for each contact associated to a company in the results. Default is true. Note if this is set to true then contacts will be returned whether or not contacts is set to true or false.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of results to return (size is always 100).

403.description: The API or account doesn't have permissions for that operation.

post.description: Create a new company in the account. This is only available to accounts with an Advanced+ subscription.

requestBody.description: Post body request with the company details used to create a new company.

400.description: The API call was not correct.

403.description: The API or account doesn't have permissions for that operation.

get.description: Fetch a company and details. This is only available to accounts with an Advanced+ subscription.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: UUID of the company to fetch.

400.description: The API call was not correct.

403.description: The API or account doesn't have permissions for that operation.

put.description: Update the details of a company. This is only available to Advanced and higher subscriptions.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: UUID of the company to edit.

requestBody.description: Changes to be made to a company.

400.description: The API call was not correct.

403.description: The API or account doesn't have permissions for that operation.

get.summary: Get the job roles for the account.
get.description: Get the job roles that can be assigned to contacts.

400.description: The API call was not correct.

get.description: Return a list of ideas that match any supplied filter criteria.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: One or more tag names to filter the ideas by. These act as an OR not AND.

parameters.name: product
parameters.description: Name of a product to filter the ideas by.

parameters.name: persona
parameters.description: Name of a persona to filter the ideas by.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Name of a workflow status to filter the ideas by.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Filters the returned ideas based on their state. Active Public is same as portal in the UI. If not included then the endpoint returns all active and active_public the same as the UI.

parameters.name: external_id
parameters.description: Return ideas or idea with a specific external_id.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page of results to return

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The number of results per page

403.description: The API or account doesn't have permissions for that operation.

post.description: Add an idea to the account.

requestBody.description: Idea to add to the account

400.description: The API call was not correct.

403.description: The API or account doesn't have permissions for that operation.

get.description: Use the numeric ID to return an Idea object.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the idea unless using the by_project_id then it is the numeric project ID (the Idea number seen in the UI).

parameters.name: expanded
parameters.description: Whether to return the expanded version of the idea ojbect. This adds in business case, user stories, comments, etc.

parameters.name: by_project_id
parameters.description: Whether the ID represents the project_id instead of the numeric ID.

403.description: The API or account doesn't have permissions for that operation.

404.description: Idea with the id not found.

put.description: Update the fields of an existing idea.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the idea (not the project id).

parameters.description: Numeric ID of the idea.

requestBody.description: New workflow status of the idea.

maybe.description: All the users who indicated maybe on the idea.

ThoughtList.description: List of all thoughts made in an account.

web_url.description: The URL to the idea in the ProdPad UI. Useful for providing a link to the original source in other applications.

impact_scaled.description: The imapct value in the scale.

effort_scaled.description: The effort value in the scale.

updated_at.description: When the idea was last updated.

functional_spec.description: The functional specs for this idea. It is a free text field. This field can contain HTML markup and UTF-8 character codes.

notes.description: Notes on the idea. It is a free text field. This field can contain HTML markup and UTF-8 character codes.

comments.description: List of comments made on the idea.

roadmap_cards.description: List of roadmap cards the idea is associated to.

mockups.description: List of all the associated mockups and designs.

files.description: List of files associated to the idea.

id.description: Numeric id of the idea to link to an object when creating.
Numeric id of the tag to link to an object when creating.

name.description: Name of the tag to link to an object when creating.

id.description: Numeric ID of the product to link to an object when creating.

name.description: Name of the product to link to an object when creating. It must match exactly.

name.description: Name of the persona to link to an object when creating. It must match exactly.

The URL of the external link.

contact_id.description: ID of the contact providing the feedback. Either Contact ID or Contact name is required.

name.description: Name of the contact providing the feedback. Either Contact ID or Contact name is required.

feedback.description: The feedback. This field accepts HTML and is stored as UTF-8.

email.description: The email of the contact. This is used to avoid duplication of contacts. This can be any unique ID for each contact.

about.description: Text field about the contact. This will overright the existing about if the contact already exists. This field accepts HTML and is stored as UTF-8.

source.description: The source from where the feedback was gathered. If none is supplied the default is API.

FeedbackPost.description: Fields to create a feedback. Note either the contact ID or contact name is required. Otherwise a 400 error will be returned. If a name and email field are used, the value in the email field will be used to see if the contact already exists and if it does the feedback will be automatically added to the existing contact.

email.description: Can be email or other unique identifier. This is used to de-duplicate contacts.

about.description: Details on the contact. This field accepts HTML and is stored as UTF-8.

company.description: UUID of the company to link the contact to. The UUID can be determined using /GET companies endpoint.

job_role.description: The UUID of the job role. The UUID can be /GET job_roles endpoint

city.description: City the company is located in or you want to tag with.

country.description: ISO Alpha-2 two letter country code.

size.description: The size of the company by employees

story.description: The main body of a user story. This field accepts HTML and is stored as UTF-8.

acceptance_criteria.description: The acceptance criteria for passing tests. This field accepts HTML and is stored as UTF-8.

comment.description: The comment someone has made on the idea. This field accepts HTML and is stored as UTF-8.

user_id.description: Numeric ID of the user in ProdPad who is making the comment.

idea_id.description: Numeric ID of the idea to change the status on.

user_id.description: Numeric ID of the user changing the workflow status of an idea.

status_id.description: Numeric ID of the status to change the idea to. Can be found using GET /statuses.

title.description: The title of the idea. Either the title or description is required.

description.description: The description of the idea. This field accepts HTML and is stored as UTF-8.

creator.description: Numeric ID of a user that has a role in the account.

functional.description: The functional specs of how this idea could be implemented. This field accepts HTML and is stored as UTF-8.

notes.description: Free text field for notes on the idea. This field accepts HTML and is stored as UTF-8.

state.description: Set the state of the idea to active, archived or unsorted.

title.description: The title of the roadmap card.

column_id.description: Numeric column ID. This can be found using GET /roadmaps/{id}.

description.description: The description of the problem(s) and/or hypothesis this card is about. This field accepts HTML and is stored as UTF-8.

idea_id.description: Numeric ID of the idea to associate the vote too. This can be retrieved from GET /ideas

user_id.description: Numeric ID of the user with a role in the account who is making the thought.

comment.description: Comment made when adding the thought. This field accepts HTML and is stored as UTF-8.

updated_at.description: When the thought was last updated.

role_type.description: Role of the user in the account.

name.description: The name to display for the user in the UI.

timezone.description: Timezone of the user using the format like Europe/London.

description.description: The description of the idea. This field accepts HTML and is stored as UTF-8.

functional.description: Functional specs for the idea. This field accepts HTML and is stored as UTF-8.

notes.description: General notes on the idea. This field accepts HTML and is stored as UTF-8.

feedback.description: Update to the actual feedback. This field accepts HTML and is stored as UTF-8.

user_message.description: Error message that can be displayed to users.

vote.description: The thought associated to the comment.

column_number.description: Number of the column on the roadmap.

id.description: ID of the comment associated to the thought.

comment.description: The comment with the though. This field can contain HTML markup and UTF-8 character codes.

id.description: The ID of the product the objective belongs too.

problem.description: What problem is this idea solving. This field can contain HTML markup and UTF-8 character codes.

value.description: What is the value of solving this problem. This field can contain HTML markup and UTF-8 character codes.

original.description: URL to the original image of contact.

tags.description: Comma separate list of tags filtered on.

persona.description: Comma separated list of personas filtered on.

company.description: ID of the company filtered on.

job_role.description: ID of the job role filtered on.

feedbacks.description: Whether to return the feedbacks for each contact.

original.description: URL to the original image of contact.

tags.description: Comma separate list of tags filtered on.

size.description: the size of the company filtered on.

value.description: the value of the company filtered on.

country.description: ISO Alpha-2 two letter country code filtered on.

feedbacks.description: Whether the feedback associated to the company via the contacts associated to the company are included in the results.

contacts.description: Whether the company contacts are included in the results.

id.description: ID of productline a product is in.

order.description: Order of the product in the product line.

count.description: Count of ideas that match the query and filters.

SearchResults_ideas.description: The list of ideas that match the query and filters.

count.description: Count of products that match the query and filters.

SearchResults_products.description: The list of products that match the query and filters.

count.description: The count of personas that match the query and filters.

SearchResults_personas.description: The list of personas of that match the query and filters.

count.description: The count of pieces of feedback that match the query and filters.

SearchResults_feedback.description: The feedback that matches the query and filters.

added.description: When the idea was switched to the workflow status.

comment.description: The comment. This field may contain HTML and UTF-8 characters.

IdeaStatusChangeResponse_comments.description: Any comment added when changing the status.

problem.description: The problem or hypothesis this idea is aiming to address. This field accepts HTML and is stored as UTF-8.

value.description: The value of solving this problem or hypothesis to the user and the company. This field accepts HTML and is stored as UTF-8.

id.description: ID of the workflow status. This can be retrieved from GET /statuses.
Numeric poduct ID to link the objective too.
UUID of the objective to link to the roadmap card.
Account ID for the roadmap card.
ID of the product that the roadmap belongs to.
ID of the roadmap column the card is on.
ID of the comment associated to the thought.

comment.description: The comment with the though. May include HTML and UTF-8 characters.

problem.description: The problem or hypothesis this idea focuses on. This field accepts HTML and is stored as UTF-8.

value.description: The value to user and company to address the problem. This field accepts HTML and is stored as UTF-8.

Forbidden.description: The API or account doesn't have permissions for that operation.

Malformed.description: The API call was not correct.
